title: Microsoft Windows Xp Pro Corp +SP3 (v5.1.2600.5512)
description:
Windows XP Pro Corp +Sp3 - Slipstreamed by KTM_Dave7 (the Cleanist Way)
__________________________________________________________________________________
*** I started with A Windows XP Pro Corp + SP0.iso Image (v5.1.2600.0 Gold)
    This is No Service Pack added. The .iso was 488 MB (512,342,016 bytes) with Label \\\&#039;WXPVOL_EN\\\&#039;

*** I started with SP3 Build 5012 RTM which is (324,030 KB or 331,805,736 bytes)





What I Did ?
__________________________________________________________________________________
1. I extracted the Windows XP Pro Corp +SP0.iso Image to Hard Drive.
   The \\\&#039;C:\\\\XP\\\&#039; Folder was 484 MB (507,949,777 bytes - 6,491 Files, 134 Folders)

2. I extracted SP3 (build 5512) files from the installer file.
   I copied the XPSP3.exe installer file to Hard Drive to look like this :	C:\\\\SP3\\\\XPSP3.exe
	Start Menu - Run - \\\&#039;cmd\\\&#039;
		CD \\\\
		CD \\\\SP3
	Clicked \\\"OK\\\" to extraction Complete prompt.
    It extracted out to a folder \\\&#039;C:\\\\SP3\\\\i386\\\&#039; with 398 MB (417,341,476 bytes - 3,707 Files, 111 Folders)
	

3. Now, I combined Windows XP Pro Corp +SP0 with the Files from SP3.
	Go back to cmd Dos Window
		CD \\\\i386
		CD \\\\update
		update -S:C:\\\\XP
	Clicked \\\"OK\\\" to Integrated install has completed successfully prompt.
	Close cmd Dos Window.
   \\\&#039;C:\\\\XP\\\&#039; Folder now has SP3 Slipstreamed into it. It is 587 MB (615,677,980 bytes - 7,116 Files, 179 Folders)

4. I used ISOBuster, to Extracted Bootable Image file from Windows XP Pro Corp + SP0.iso Image.
   Image is called \\\&#039;Microsoft Corporation.img\\\&#039; (2048 bytes)

5. Create .iso Image of Windows XP Pro Corp +SP3 (v5.1.2600.5512)
	I Started Nero Burning ROM (my version is v6.0.15d).
	Open up Nero Burning ROM - New Compilation -
	Use the pictures from ! Slipstream SP into Windows XP.mht
	New CD Title is \\\&#039;WXPVOL_EN_SP3\\\&#039;
        I even Added back all CD Title Properties from Microsoft

6. Done.

7. You can Burn Image to CD and use that. Or Extract it for Nlite type program. 






*** The Finished Product Windows XP Pro Corp +SP3.iso Image is 596 MB (625,160,192 bytes)
    If you were to extract it (for say nLite program) it will be 587 MB (615,677,980 bytes - 7116 Files, 179 Folders)

*** You will need a working Product Key. You can Google Info about it.
    I\\\&#039;ve used the same key for Years and never had problems getting updates.

*** This is the Cleanist Windows XP Pro Corp out.
    I love to Use nLite when I slipstream normally.
    This is Cleaner, and ready for nLite (if you desire).
